name: 王多柏
objective: Learn about the use of various electronic design automation (EDA) tools and basic logic circuit design and hardware description language (HDL) design.
schedule:
　　EDA tool: Quartus II, introduction and usage
　　Quartus II: Logic circuit design and simulation lab.
　　4-bit AND array
　　Decoder 
　　Encoder (Priority Encoder)
　　Multiplexer
　　De-multiplexer
　　Comparator
　　8-bit parity generator
　　Full adder
　　Latch
　　D Latch
　　3-bit synchronous counter
　　Counter
　　Shift register
　　State Machines
materials: Textbook:  Digital Design with CPLD Applications and VHDL, 2nd Edition. Dueck
